code: function swap(array,indexOne,indexTwo){var temp=array[indexOne];array[indexOne]=array[indexTwo];array[indexTwo]=temp;}function bubbleSort(array){var animations=[];for(var i=0;i<array.length;i++){var swapped=false;animations.push(["check",0,1]);for(var j=0;j<array.length-i-1;j++){var heightOne=array[j].props.value;var heightTwo=array[j+1].props.value;if(heightOne>heightTwo){swap(array,j,j+1);swapped=true;animations.push(["swap",j,j+1]);}if(j+2<=array.length-i-1){animations.push(["uncheck-check",j,j+2]);}else{animations.push(["uncheck",j,j+1]);}}if(!swapped){break;}}return animations;}export default bubbleSort;
